title: Remove unneeded ProGuard rules.
message:
Remove unneeded ProGuard rules.

- Remove obsolete appcompat internal menu obfuscation. The package names have changed, so this no longer has any effect.
- Simplified proguard config as obfuscating is now disabled, Butterknife ships its own ProGuard rules.
